pages.text: $(li)Rattlesnakes don't usually do much, but sometimes they may hunt other tiny animals.$(br)$(li)If you get too close to a Rattlesnake, it is going to make a rattle warning sound.$(br)$(li)If one gets close enought to a Rattlesnake while it is rattling, it will attack you with its poison.
$(li)Rattlesnakes can be bred with any type of Meat.$(br)$(li)Rattlesnakes are the favourite prey of the Roadrunners.$(br)$(li)Rattlesnakes may drop a Rattlesnake Rattle on death.
